Judo Saskatchewan Referee Committee
Ross Kostron, National A (Chair)
Robb Karaim, IJF B (Continental)
Kim Bergey-Kaip, National A


Upcoming Events:

  • January 25, 2020--Regina Y Provincial Tournament--Referee Meeting: Saturday - 10:30 AM NEW REFEREE"S WELCOME-you will work directly with a mentor referee at the mat to help with protocols and application of the rules.
  • March 6-8, 2020--Edmonton International Judo Championships: Online registration-Edmonton International Referee Symposium National A, B & C grading. Register at: Judo Canada
  • March 28, 2020-Judo Sask Provincial Championships--Referee Meeting: Saturday 9:00-9:45 AM. There will be a grading for Provincial “A”, “B” and “C” referee candidates.
